caseStudyDescription.caseStudyDescription: Helping a payments organization refine a new technical specification, supporting UI elements, and UX flows prior to global launch

caseStudyContent.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"A payments organization developed a new technical specification and UI elements for digital commerce. As a larger research team of five, we helped them iterate and understand key areas of functionality prior to public release. The work was global and in addition to my role in usability testing in the US, I went to one of four international markets to understand nuance and unique needs in Germany. Following our comprehensive qualitative study, I partnered with our quant team who evaluated the offering in a large scale global quantitative study along a number of UX metrics to understand the systems usability, functionality, desirability. The product is now launched, and our team impacted key areas around OTP and checkout workflows.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
